conversations.dialog: Hey there, good to see a fresh face around here. I’m Andy hope ya get settled in. I’m always ‘round if ya feel the need for a drink or a hand of cards. I got some fresh bread here too, feel free to take some if ya get hungry.
Well hope ya get settled in. I’m always around if ya feel the need for a drink of a hand of cards, got some fresh <color=yellow>bread</color> here, feel free to take some if ya get hungry.

choices.choice: How long have you been here?
choices.response: Just over a couple of weeks. It’s a nice enough ride, though I’m not sure where we’re headed, and that <color=yellow>driver</color> kinda gives me the <color=yellow>willies</color>.

choices.choice: Have you met any of the other passengers?
choices.response: Yeah that <color=yellow>Hunter</color> aint got much class, but she’s a hoot and a half I’ll tell ya that. Got <color=yellow>stories</color> that’ll make any man squirm like a racoon in the wash. The lil’ fellas a tad odd for my taste seems decent enough but i don’t trust him much. Always just sorta <color=yellow>staring</color> at ya, like he’s seein right through ya.

choices.choice: Do you know anything about this train?
choices.response: Not much, no. Driver told me this was a place of change and possibility but kept saying I should just enjoy the ride. Had a good look ‘round of course, It’s freaky though carriages just seem to appear when you want them.

choices.choice: What did you do before this?
choices.response: Well… been a soldier most my life. Got made a sergeant after my C.O was taken <color=yellow>out</color>. Never <color=yellow>expected</color> when I signed up that I’d be in <color=yellow>charge</color> of anyone.
